briefdescription.para: Convert an interval represented as MIDI based double value to a frequency factor.

detaileddescription.para: The microtonal part is retained in the double return value.

parameterdescription.para: interval in a midi based double. A half tone is represented as 1.00, and an octave as 12.00.

briefdescription.para: Convert an interval from factor representation to a pitch based double according to MIDI pitch numbers.

detaileddescription.para: The microtonal part can be given in the double value.

simplesect.para: a double value that represents the interval. a semitone is represented as 1.00, and an octave as 12.00

briefdescription.para: Convert an interval represented as MIDI based double value to a frequency.

detaileddescription.para: The microtonal part is retained in the double return value.

parameterdescription.para: pitch in a midi based double. A half tone is represented as 1.00, and an octave as 12.00.

briefdescription.para: Convert a tone from frequency representation to a pitch based double according to MIDI pitch numbers.

detaileddescription.para: The microtonal part can be given in the double value.

simplesect.para: a double value that represents the pitch. a semitone is represented as 1.00, and an octave as 12.00
